text.name: system_description
text.text: The PlayStation Vita (プレイステーション・ヴィータ) is a portable video games console. Its codename was Next Generation Portable (NGP). It is the successor to the PlayStation Portable and its various derivatives. Its main competitors are the Nintendo 3DS and the smartphone market.
